1_15P5kZhBwmwiuBmSUBSkBsT2DLEUYvn24u.body:
I've read it and it's excellent, like most other Doctorow works.

Incidentally, It's available for download within ZeroNet through [The Free Library](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Hsv1b1ij5gAk5SGc23tmDmUQXwF31aXWb). To download it, all you need is a running ZeroNet instance and to click here:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Hsv1b1ij5gAk5SGc23tmDmUQXwF31aXWb/?Post:3:Cory+Doctorow+-+Little+Brother

Enjoy!

1_18ZfPCaU1pYAeos3A7YhZVgtsmXqXeRRW7.body:
I have a basic premise to think that `ZeroMail != EMail` despite its name.

I think of ZeroMail more along the lines of Bitmessage: a P2P messaging system,  encrypted by default and with its own separate network. Perhaps, then, it would be better to rename it ZeroMessage to avoid confusion, but again, those are just my 2c.
